The third version of '''0.25 SURVIVAL TEST''' is a version of [[Survival Test]] released September 3, 2009, at around 16:26 UTC.<ref name="release">[[#logs|IRC logs]]: "''A11:26:38 <08Notch> ok, I fixed the creeper craters''" [...] "''A11:26:43 <08Notch> and added a load button to the death screen''" (16:26 UTC)</ref>

== Changes ==
=== General ===
'''Game over screen'''
* Added "Load Level" button to the [[death]] screen.<ref name="release" />

== Fixes ==
'''1 bug fixed'''
* [[Creeper]]s now have the same blast radius as they did before [[Java Edition Classic 0.25 SURVIVAL TEST|0.25]].<ref name="release" />{{More info needed|What was it before?}}
